Comments_List: Working on the thesis independently allowed me to draft my own research lists, as well as learn how to space work out over the course of the semester.
I really liked getting to work on my thesis on my own with an outside advisor. It was especially helpful working on my own timeline during a busy semester.

Strengths: allows you to tailor the thesis to your interests
Weaknesses: easy to procrastinate when senior year is pretty busy
Yes, the independent thesis is a great option for students who want more flexibility with their senior thesis.
I recommend taking PLSC 480 if you would like to write you senior essay on a topic not covered in a seminar.

Write your senior essay in one semester if you have a dedicated advisor who will walk through the research process and paper writing process with you in great depth. Set a schedule and deadlines (even if just self-imposed) for yourself at the start of the semester and follow it!! You don't want to be writing the entirety of your thesis at the end of the semester. Most other majors have deadlines but because poli-sci doesn't, it is important to set them for yourself.
Depends on what you want to write, and the adviser you choose.
